markdownRemark.html:
The future is more uncertain than it has been at most times. It’s hard to proceed as usual, though many wish to do so.

The world is ready to move forward with consequences set aside. Find the right ways to push the extents of others’ beliefs by being more impactful than forceful.

frontmatter.description: The world is ready to move forward with consequences set aside. Find the right ways to push the extents of others' beliefs by being more impactful than forceful.
frontmatter.title: Push extents
